import { Typography, Row, Col, Statistic, Button } from "antd" import millify from "millify" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import Cryptocurrencies from "./Cryptocurrencies" import News from "./News" const {Title} = Typography const Homepage = ({coin,market}) =>{ return( <> Global Crypto Stats {coin === 0 || market === 0? null :
Top 12 Cryptocurrencies in the world Show More
Latest Crypto News Show More
} ) } export default Homepage
